title: Rioter for 1000th Win
body:
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-popcorn}} 

Back when I was a wee lad, on stormy nights in the desolate days of season 2, stories were told.

Stories of players, oh devoted players, on the edge of glory: 999 wins.

These players would call out:

 "Riot, hear my cries! Join me on the eve of my greatest victory!"

And join they did.

---

It's been 6 long years since those fateful nights, and still I persevered, so that I might stand where they once stood.

And now it's my turn. 

The edge of glory.

999.

Riot, hear my cries! Join me on the eve of my greatest victory!
